sentences.en: The macrocosm of the universe is mirrored in the microcosm of the mind.
sentences.cn: 宏观宇宙在人的心灵宇宙中得以反映。

sentences.en: She saw herself mirrored in the window.
sentences.cn: 她看到自己在窗玻璃上照出的影像。

sentences.en: The music of the time mirrored the feeling of optimism in the country.
sentences.cn: 这个时期的音乐反映出这个国家的乐观精神。
